item.title: Grinding to a halt – China bans imports of waste
item.author: Sam Owens,
item.description: The UK has declared war on single-use plastic. Reusable coffee cups are everywhere, with Imperial’s cafes charging those without one an extra 15p, and plastic bags and straws are looked upon with horror. The government is riding this wave of public opinion, having imposed a 5p levy on the former in …
